code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Axios from"axios";import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import"./recipeViewerPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RecipeViewerPage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[ingredients,setIngredients]=useState("");const[instructions,setInstructions]=useState("");const[url,setUrl]=useState("");const[image,setImage]=useState("");const getRecipe=()=>{Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/getrecipe",{id:id}).then(response=>{setTitle(response.data[0].title);setIngredients(response.data[0].ingredients);setInstructions(response.data[0].instructions);setUrl(response.data[0].url);setImage(response.data[0].image);});};useEffect(()=>{getRecipe();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-viewer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:url,children:"Recipe source"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,width:"300"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Ingredients:"}),ingredients,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Instructions:"}),instructions]});};export default RecipeViewerPage;
